companyDescription: Astro Malaysia Holdings Berhad is Malaysia’s leading content and entertainment company. They serve 5.3 million homes or 67% of Malaysian TV households, 8,400 enterprises, 18.2 million weekly listeners on FM and online radio, and 15.6 million visitors to their digital brands every month.
